meanings.definition: A risky or uncertain situation or undertaking.
meanings.sent1: Life can be a real crapshoot sometimes.
meanings.sent2: Playing the lottery is like a crapshoot - you never know if you'll win.
meanings.sent3: Deciding to go bungee jumping was a real crapshoot for me!
meanings.sent4: Starting a new business is a crapshoot - you never know if it will succeed.
meanings.sent5: Entering the talent show felt like a crapshoot, but I ended up winning!

meanings.definition: To take a chance or gamble.
meanings.sent1: I decided to crapshoot and ask my crush out on a date.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes you have to crapshoot and try new things to see what works.
meanings.sent3: I'm going to crapshoot and try the spicy food challenge at the fair.
meanings.sent4: She had to crapshoot and choose between two job offers.
meanings.sent5: Don't be afraid to crapshoot and pursue your dreams!
